participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Insecure yet resilient, she often hides her feelings behind a sweet facade.
participant_1.background: I prefer to keep my hair natural. I have two things I love: cookies and my long curly hair. I am a student who is not well-liked. I went through a lot of changes in a short amount of time. I am known as the iron skittler in the skittles universe.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Witty and compassionate, he has a genuine love for animals and a keen sense of humor.
participant_2.background: I am looking for a new home that is pet-friendly and close to my work. I'm a vet student, so I can help animals and use my math and science skills in a career that I love. I am witty. I'm going to spend time with my family and friends. I start my day with a healthy breakfast of organic granola and fruit.

content.text: Hello!
Hi there!
I'm looking for a new home, do you know of any that are pet-friendly and close to work?
I actually just moved into a new home that is pet-friendly and close to work! It's a great place.
That's great! How do you like it so far?
I love it! It's perfect for me.
I'm glad to hear that!
I'm a vet student, so I can help animals and use my math and science skills in a career that I love.
That sounds like a great career!
Thanks! I'm pretty excited about it.
What made you want to become a vet?
I've always loved animals, and I wanted to do something that would help them.
That's a great reason!
Thanks!
What's your favorite animal?
I think my favorite animal is the dog. They're so loyal and loving.
Dogs are great! I have a dog too.
Oh, that's awesome! What kind of dog is it?
He's a golden retriever.
Golden retrievers are so cute
